speaker: GLOUCESTER
text:
I
               
              am
               
              come
               
              to
               
              survey
               
              the
               
              Tower
               
              this
               
              day
              .

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text:
Since
               
              Henry’s
               
              death
               
              I
               
              fear
               
              there
               
              is
               
              conveyance
              .

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text:
Where
               
              be
               
              these
               
              warders
               
              that
               
              they
               
              wait
               
              not
               
              here
              ?
              —

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text:
Open
               
              the
               
              gates
              !
               
              ’Tis
               
              Gloucester
               
              that
               
              calls
              .

speaker:
FIRST
               
              WARDER
text:
Who’s
               
              there
               
              that
               
              knocks
               
              so
               
              imperiously
              ?

speaker:
FIRST
               
              SERVINGMAN
text:
It
               
              is
               
              the
               
              noble
               
              Duke
               
              of
               
              Gloucester
              .

speaker:
SECOND
               
              WARDER
text:
Whoe’er
               
              he
               
              be
              ,
               
              you
               
              may
               
              not
               
              be
               
              let
               
              in
              .

speaker:
FIRST
               
              SERVINGMAN
text:
Villains
              ,
               
              answer
               
              you
               
              so
               
              the
               
              Lord
               
              Protector
              ?

speaker:
FIRST
               
              WARDER
text:
The
               
              Lord
               
              protect
               
              him
              ,
               
              so
               
              we
               
              answer
               
              him
              .

speaker:
FIRST
               
              WARDER
text:
We
               
              do
               
              no
               
              otherwise
               
              than
               
              we
               
              are
               
              willed
              .

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text:
Who
               
              willed
               
              you
              ?
               
              Or
               
              whose
               
              will
               
              stands
               
              but
               
              mine
              ?

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text:
There’s
               
              none
               
              Protector
               
              of
               
              the
               
              realm
               
              but
               
              I
              .
              —

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text:
Break
               
              up
               
              the
               
              gates
              !
               
              I’ll
               
              be
               
              your
               
              warrantize
              .

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text:
Shall
               
              I
               
              be
               
              flouted
               
              thus
               
              by
               
              dunghill
               
              grooms
              ?

speaker: WOODVILLE
text:
What
               
              noise
               
              is
               
              this
              ?
               
              What
               
              traitors
               
              have
               
              we
               
              here
              ?

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text:
Lieutenant
              ,
               
              is
               
              it
               
              you
               
              whose
               
              voice
               
              I
               
              hear
              ?

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text:
Open
               
              the
               
              gates
              .
               
              Here’s
               
              Gloucester
               
              that
               
              would
               
              enter
              .

speaker: WOODVILLE
text:
Have
               
              patience
              ,
               
              noble
               
              duke
              ,
               
              I
               
              may
               
              not
               
              open
              .

speaker: WOODVILLE
text:
The
               
              Cardinal
               
              of
               
              Winchester
               
              forbids
              .

speaker: WOODVILLE
text:
From
               
              him
               
              I
               
              have
               
              express
               
              commandment

speaker: WOODVILLE
text:
That
               
              thou
               
              nor
               
              none
               
              of
               
              thine
               
              shall
               
              be
               
              let
               
              in
              .

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text:
Fainthearted
               
              Woodville
              ,
               
              prizest
               
              him
               
              ’fore
               
              me
              ?

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text:
Arrogant
               
              Winchester
              ,
               
              that
               
              haughty
               
              prelate

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text:
Whom
               
              Henry
              ,
               
              our
               
              late
               
              sovereign
              ,
               
              ne’er
               
              could
               
              brook
              ?

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text:
Thou
               
              art
               
              no
               
              friend
               
              to
               
              God
               
              or
               
              to
               
              the
               
              King
              .

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text:
Open
               
              the
               
              gates
              ,
               
              or
               
              I’ll
               
              shut
               
              thee
               
              out
               
              shortly
              .

speaker: SERVINGMEN
text:
Open
               
              the
               
              gates
               
              unto
               
              the
               
              Lord
               
              Protector
              ,

speaker: SERVINGMEN
text:
Or
               
              we’ll
               
              burst
               
              them
               
              open
               
              if
               
              that
               
              you
               
              come
               
              not
               
              quickly
              .

speaker: WINCHESTER
text:
How
               
              now
              ,
               
              ambitious
               
              Humphrey
              ,
               
              what
               
              means
               
              this
              ?

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text:
Peeled
               
              priest
              ,
               
              dost
               
              thou
               
              command
               
              me
               
              to
               
              be
               
              shut
               
              out
              ?

speaker: WINCHESTER
text:
I
               
              do
              ,
               
              thou
               
              most
               
              usurping
               
              proditor
              —

speaker: WINCHESTER
text:
And
               
              not
               
              Protector
              —
              of
               
              the
               
              King
               
              or
               
              realm
              .

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text:
Stand
               
              back
              ,
               
              thou
               
              manifest
               
              conspirator
              ,

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text:
Thou
               
              that
               
              contrived’st
               
              to
               
              murder
               
              our
               
              dead
               
              lord
              ,

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text:
Thou
               
              that
               
              giv’st
               
              whores
               
              indulgences
               
              to
               
              sin
              !

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text:
I’ll
               
              canvass
               
              thee
               
              in
               
              thy
               
              broad
               
              cardinal’s
               
              hat

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text:
If
               
              thou
               
              proceed
               
              in
               
              this
               
              thy
               
              insolence
              .

speaker: WINCHESTER
text:
Nay
              ,
               
              stand
               
              thou
               
              back
              .
               
              I
               
              will
               
              not
               
              budge
               
              a
               
              foot
              .

speaker: WINCHESTER
text:
This
               
              be
               
              Damascus
              ;
               
              be
               
              thou
               
              cursèd
               
              Cain

speaker: WINCHESTER
text:
To
               
              slay
               
              thy
               
              brother
               
              Abel
              ,
               
              if
               
              thou
               
              wilt
              .

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text:
I
               
              will
               
              not
               
              slay
               
              thee
              ,
               
              but
               
              I’ll
               
              drive
               
              thee
               
              back
              .

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text:
Thy
               
              scarlet
               
              robes
              ,
               
              as
               
              a
               
              child’s
               
              bearing-cloth
              ,

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text:
I’ll
               
              use
               
              to
               
              carry
               
              thee
               
              out
               
              of
               
              this
               
              place
              .

speaker: WINCHESTER
text:
Do
               
              what
               
              thou
               
              dar’st
              ,
               
              I
               
              beard
               
              thee
               
              to
               
              thy
               
              face
              .

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text:
What
              ,
               
              am
               
              I
               
              dared
               
              and
               
              bearded
               
              to
               
              my
               
              face
              ?
              —

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text:
Draw
              ,
               
              men
              ,
               
              for
               
              all
               
              this
               
              privilegèd
               
              place
              .

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text:
Blue
               
              coats
               
              to
               
              tawny
               
              coats
              !

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text:
Priest
              ,
               
              beware
               
              your
               
              beard
              .

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text:
I
               
              mean
               
              to
               
              tug
               
              it
               
              and
               
              to
               
              cuff
               
              you
               
              soundly
              .

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text:
Under
               
              my
               
              feet
               
              I’ll
               
              stamp
               
              thy
               
              cardinal’s
               
              hat
              ;

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text:
In
               
              spite
               
              of
               
              pope
               
              or
               
              dignities
               
              of
               
              Church
              ,

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text:
Here
               
              by
               
              the
               
              cheeks
               
              I’ll
               
              drag
               
              thee
               
              up
               
              and
               
              down
              .

speaker: WINCHESTER
text:
Gloucester
              ,
               
              thou
               
              wilt
               
              answer
               
              this
               
              before
               
              the
               
              Pope
              .

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text:
Winchester
               
              goose
              ,
               
              I
               
              cry
               
              “
              a
               
              rope
              ,
               
              a
               
              rope
              !
              ”
              —

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text:
Now
               
              beat
               
              them
               
              hence
              ;
               
              why
               
              do
               
              you
               
              let
               
              them
               
              stay
              ?
              —

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text:
Thee
               
              I’ll
               
              chase
               
              hence
              ,
               
              thou
               
              wolf
               
              in
               
              sheep’s
               
              array
              .
              —

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text:
Out
              ,
               
              tawny
               
              coats
              ,
               
              out
              ,
               
              scarlet
               
              hypocrite
              !

speaker: MAYOR
text:
Fie
              ,
               
              lords
              ,
               
              that
               
              you
              ,
               
              being
               
              supreme
               
              magistrates
              ,

speaker: MAYOR
text:
Thus
               
              contumeliously
               
              should
               
              break
               
              the
               
              peace
              !

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text:
Peace
              ,
               
              Mayor
              ?
               
              Thou
               
              know’st
               
              little
               
              of
               
              my
               
              wrongs
              .

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text:
Here’s
               
              Beaufort
              ,
               
              that
               
              regards
               
              nor
               
              God
               
              nor
               
              king
              ,

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text:
Hath
               
              here
               
              distrained
               
              the
               
              Tower
               
              to
               
              his
               
              use
              .

speaker: WINCHESTER
text:
Here’s
               
              Gloucester
              ,
               
              a
               
              foe
               
              to
               
              citizens
              ,

speaker: WINCHESTER
text:
One
               
              that
               
              still
               
              motions
               
              war
               
              and
               
              never
               
              peace
              ,

speaker: WINCHESTER
text:
O’ercharging
               
              your
               
              free
               
              purses
               
              with
               
              large
               
              fines
              ;

speaker: WINCHESTER
text:
That
               
              seeks
               
              to
               
              overthrow
               
              religion

speaker: WINCHESTER
text:
Because
               
              he
               
              is
               
              Protector
               
              of
               
              the
               
              realm
              ,

speaker: WINCHESTER
text:
And
               
              would
               
              have
               
              armor
               
              here
               
              out
               
              of
               
              the
               
              Tower

speaker: WINCHESTER
text:
To
               
              crown
               
              himself
               
              king
               
              and
               
              suppress
               
              the
               
              Prince
              .

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text:
I
               
              will
               
              not
               
              answer
               
              thee
               
              with
               
              words
              ,
               
              but
               
              blows
              .

speaker: MAYOR
text:
Naught
               
              rests
               
              for
               
              me
               
              in
               
              this
               
              tumultuous
               
              strife

speaker: MAYOR
text:
But
               
              to
               
              make
               
              open
               
              proclamation
              .

speaker: MAYOR
text:
Come
              ,
               
              officer
              ,
               
              as
               
              loud
               
              as
               
              e’er
               
              thou
               
              canst
              ,
               
              cry
              .

speaker: OFFICER
text:
All
                 
                manner
                 
                of
                 
                men
                ,
                 
                assembled
                 
                here
                 
                in
                
                arms
                 
                this
                 
                day
                 
                against
                 
                God’s
                 
                peace
                 
                and
                 
                the
                 
                King’s
                ,
                 
                we
                
                charge
                 
                and
                 
                command
                 
                you
                ,
                 
                in
                 
                his
                 
                Highness’
                 
                name
                ,
                 
                to
                
                repair
                 
                to
                 
                your
                 
                several
                 
                dwelling
                 
                places
                ,
                 
                and
                 
                not
                 
                to
                
                wear
                ,
                 
                handle
                ,
                 
                or
                 
                use
                 
                any
                 
                sword
                ,
                 
                weapon
                ,
                 
                or
                 
                dagger
                
                henceforward
                ,
                 
                upon
                 
                pain
                 
                of
                 
                death
                .

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text:
Cardinal
              ,
               
              I’ll
               
              be
               
              no
               
              breaker
               
              of
               
              the
               
              law
              ,

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text:
But
               
              we
               
              shall
               
              meet
               
              and
               
              break
               
              our
               
              minds
               
              at
               
              large
              .

speaker: WINCHESTER
text:
Gloucester
              ,
               
              we’ll
               
              meet
               
              to
               
              thy
               
              cost
              ,
               
              be
               
              sure
              .

speaker: WINCHESTER
text:
Thy
               
              heartblood
               
              I
               
              will
               
              have
               
              for
               
              this
               
              day’s
               
              work
              .

speaker: MAYOR
text:
I’ll
               
              call
               
              for
               
              clubs
               
              if
               
              you
               
              will
               
              not
               
              away
              .

speaker: MAYOR
text:
(
                Aside
                .
                )
                 
              
              This
               
              cardinal’s
               
              more
               
              haughty
               
              than
               
              the
               
              devil
              !

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text:
Mayor
              ,
               
              farewell
              .
               
              Thou
               
              dost
               
              but
               
              what
               
              thou
               
              mayst
              .

speaker: WINCHESTER
text:
Abominable
               
              Gloucester
              ,
               
              guard
               
              thy
               
              head
              ,

speaker: WINCHESTER
text:
For
               
              I
               
              intend
               
              to
               
              have
               
              it
               
              ere
               
              long
              .

speaker: MAYOR
text:
See
               
              the
               
              coast
               
              cleared
              ,
               
              and
               
              then
               
              we
               
              will
               
              depart
              .

speaker: MAYOR
text:
(
                Aside
                .
                )
                 
              
              Good
               
              God
              ,
               
              these
               
              nobles
               
              should
               
              such
               
              stomachs
               
              bear
              !

text:
I
               
              myself
               
              fight
               
              not
